name: io.github.daymanking990/task-orchectrator-mcp
description: A role-based task orchestrator with three-tier Trello integration for MCP. Supports Orchestrator, Architect, Coder, Analyst, and DevOps roles with automatic task lifecycle management and Trello integration through MCP Server, Direct API, or Local Storage modes.

environment_variables.name: TRELLO_API_KEY
environment_variables.description: Trello API Key for direct API integration (optional)

environment_variables.name: TRELLO_TOKEN
environment_variables.description: Trello Token for direct API integration (optional)

environment_variables.name: TRELLO_WORKING_BOARD_ID
environment_variables.description: Trello Board ID for direct API integration (optional)
